column5: Improve your employability with practical and theoretical knowledge of computer science, ready for a career in industry.This course is designed to match the growing need for graduates who are trained in one discipline and also skilled in computer science. You’ll gain a strong foundation in programming, software development and contemporary techniques in the industry.Along with programming experience, the course gives you a broad overview of computer science, with opportunities to specialise in a number of different research areas.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
